feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: She flew up the steps, red as the camellia she had just been fingering, and was in the hall and tearing open the telegram before Mr. Wilkins had finished his sentence.

causedByEvent.name: Receiving a telegram from Thomas Briggs

feels.name: Hope
feels.quote: She tried to silence the absurd hope by jeering at it. Yetâ€”if Mr. Wilkins had telegraphed, why not Frederick?

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: She stared at him, her mouth open.

causedByEvent.name: Thomas Briggs arriving at San Salvatore

feels.name: Excitement
feels.quote: He longed to see her in his house. He longed to see it as her background, to see her sitting in his chairs, drinking out of his cups, using all his things.

takePlaceAt.name: On the way to San Salvatore

feels.name: Curiosity
feels.quote: He stood examining the picture on the staircase of that Madonna by an early Italian painter, name unknown, picked up by him at Orvieto, who was so much like his tenant.

causedByEvent.name: Examining the picture of the Madonna
